GMCM.ToggleHotkey.Desc: This is the toggle hotkey for Auto-Axe.
GMCM.AutoSwitch.Desc: Automatically switch to axe when near applicable locations.
GMCM.UsingMark.Desc: Enable right-click marking to designate chopping locations, adding marked areas as chopping targets.
GMCM.KeepMark.Desc: Marks will remain even when switching to other tools.
GMCM.EffectOnTreeSeed.Desc:
Targets tree seeds and chops them out of the soil.
Best used when farm tree planting plans are complete. Not recommended to enable during tree planting planning.
GMCM.EffectOnTree.OnlyMature.Desc: Ignore trees that are still growing.
GMCM.EffectOnTree.IgnoreFarm.Desc: This option protects farm trees from being chopped accidentally.
GMCM.RetainStamina.Desc: Stop auto axe when stamina falls below this percentage.
GMCM.StaminaNotification.Desc: Notify with a message when stamina is low.
Notification.LowStamina: Low stamina detected, auto axe operation paused.
GMCM.CustomRange.Desc:
Customize the range of the axe.
If disable, it will use values based on tool upgrades.
GMCM.Range.Desc: The range that triggers the auto axe.
GMCM.CustomEfficiency.Desc:
Customize the efficiency of the axe.
If disable, it will use values based on tool upgrades.
GMCM.Efficiency.Desc: Number of items that can be chopped at once.
GMCM.MarkHotkey.Desc: Press to mark/unmark the nearest eligible tile.
